sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-row>
        <v-row class="px-3">
            <v-col cols="12" sm="8">
                <v-sheet min-height="350" rounded="lg">                   
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>          
            <v-col cols="12" sm="4">
                <v-sheet min-height="350" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="6" sm="2">
                <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>            
            <v-col v-for="card in cards" :key="card" cols="12" sm="6">
                <v-sheet class="overflow-auto" height="350px">
                    <v-list lines="two">
                        <v-list-subheader>자격증 리스트</v-list-subheader>
                        <template v-for="(item, i) in certificateItems" :key="i">
                            <v-list-item>
                                <template v-slot:prepend>
                                    <v-avatar>
                                        <v-img src="https://cdn-icons-png.flaticon.com/512/219/219986.png"></v-img>
                                    </v-avatar>
                                </template>
                                <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
                                <v-list-item-subtitle>{{ item.job }}</v-list-item-subtitle>
                            </v-list-item>
                            <v-divider v-if="i !== 4" :key="`divider-${i}`" inset></v-divider>
                        </template>
                    </v-list>                  
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>
            <v-col cols="12" sm="6">
                <v-sheet min-height="350" rounded="lg">                 
                </v-sheet>
            </v-col>          
        </v-row>
    </v-row>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    data: () => ({
        cards: ['경력 리스트'],
        certificateItems: [
            { title: '웹디자인 기능사', date: '2022년 04월 12일' },
            { title: '씽크블락', job: '웹 퍼블리셔 / 일본어(번역)' },
            { title: '도톤 플라자(Doton Plaza)', job: '일본어(통역,번역)' },
            { title: '돈키호테(Don Quijote)', job: '일본어(통역,번역)' },
            { title: '친절한 형제들', job: '레크레이션 강사' },
        ]
    }),
    beforeUnmount () {
      clearInterval(this.interval)
    },
    mounted () {
      this.interval = setInterval(() => {
        if (this.value === 80) {
          return (this.value = 80)
        }
        this.value += 10
      }, 100)
    },
}
</script>
